thread.title: Watch Friday Night Lights live now
thread.title_full: Watch Friday Night Lights live now

author: FOX 12 Staff
title: Watch Friday Night Lights live now
text:
Watch Friday Night Lights live now Posted: 
It's Friday, so that means it is time for football. 
You can watch Air 12 now as it is covering games throughout the area. 
And watch at 10:30 as Nick Krupke brings your the highlights and scores on Friday Night Lights . 
Copyright 2015 KPTV-KPDX Broadcasting Corporation.
